channel.title: Cleaned Czar By me V1
channel.description:
Well I took Summon-Pkz cleaned Czar and I was just like Wth. This could be much cleaner. So I some cleaning removed some files and whatnot.
Anyway basically I spent a lot of time trying to add the thread fix and then once it was done I realised that it didnt load moreinfo and shizzle properly so I then had to remove it. XD
This is V1 there will be other ones.
I haven't done anything major but lots of java files that weren't needed have been removed.
Do not ask for pictures huge waste of time.
This is cleaner than both the one released by The Reaper X and Primadude.
Although Primadude gets the majority of the credits currently.
Again clarifying this is ur basic czar source with some features added by Primadude (Which are very nice) and then a whole load of shit removed by me.
Next version will hopefully come with a client and I will start reading the files and removing unnessary stuff (I only merged java files like item1 2 3 and 4. And removed the ones like Antilag)
Link: http://uppit.com/v/451A7D6L
Btw: If anyone would be so kind as to Package this for me or add the Thread fix so that it loads the char files correctly I would rep you all the way to 200 XD

item.title: Cleaned Czar By me V1
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Oh dam. It would have been really nice to get my hands on that. I might do this again but this time keep the saving method that allows the thread fix to work.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleaned Czar By me V1
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Feeling the love.its saves as .txt .dat .txt again I removed some other methods of saving that were pointless as well.

So far in V2 I have:
Put .java in seperate file for convenience.
Added an action Button handler. I also intend on adding a command handler possibly the event manager thing in which case I would remove the heavily process based teleporting and use the one from Devolution.

Read full topic
